Player History
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against Detroit on 6/8/2001...
Was selected to the 2001 Allstar game...
Won Batter of the Month award on 7/1/2001, hitting .379 with 9 HR, 25 RBI...
Had 21-game hitting streak snapped on 7/11/2001...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/21/2001, hitting .560 with 3 HR, 7 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 8/1/2001, hitting .451 with 5 HR, 19 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/14/2003, hitting .500 with 1 HR, 8 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Oakland on 6/3/2003...
Was selected to the 2003 Allstar game...
Drove in 6 runs against Minnesota on 8/18/2003...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/16/2004, hitting .500 with 3 HR, 6 RBI...
Was selected to the 2006 Allstar game...
Released by Kansas City on 11/1/2007...
Signed as a free agent by Baltimore on 2/27/2008 to a 2-year deal worth $1,741,852 per year...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/11/2008, hitting .500 with 3 HR, 8 RBI...
Injured on 8/22/2008 with a Broken Foot, out for 5 weeks...
Traded from Baltimore to Montreal on 2/28/2010 (Going to MON: LF R. Myers, P J. Griffiths, CF C. Finley Jr.. Going to BAL: SS J. Peraza)...
Drafted in 4th round, 94th overall pick, by Chicago (A) in 2013...
Injured on 4/8/2017 with a Fractured Wrist, out for 4-5 weeks...
Released by Chicago (A) on 5/16/2018...
Drafted in 2nd round, 35th overall pick, by Cleveland in 2019...
Injured on 5/7/2019 with a Bruised Neck, out for 3 days...
Injured on 5/28/2019 with a Inflamed Posterior Cruciate Ligament, out for 3-4 weeks...
Drafted in 2nd round, 36th overall pick, by Chicago (N) in 1977...
Traded from Chicago (N) to St. Louis on 3/2/1977 (Going to STL: P E. Lynch, CF B. Mitchell. Going to CHC: P R. Vasquez)...
